original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhuniyo anabhiratiyā pīḷitā ovarakaṁ pavisitvā talaghātakaṁ karonti.
analyzed: ▁tena ▁kho ▁pana ▁samayena ▁dve ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁anabhi rati yā ▁ pīḷ itā ▁ o var akaṃ ▁pavisitvā ▁ta la ghāt akaṃ ▁karonti

original: Bhikkhuniyo tena saddena upadhāvitvā tā bhikkhuniyo etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁tena ▁ saddena ▁upa dhāv itvā ▁tā ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁et a da vo cu ṃ

original: “Na mayaṁ, ayye, purisena saddhiṁ sampadussāmā”ti bhikkhunīnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: ▁na ▁mayaṃ ▁a yy e ▁puris ena ▁saddhiṃ ▁sampa du ssāmāti ▁bhikkhunī naṃ ▁etamatthaṃ ▁ārocesuṃ

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo talaghātakaṁ karissanti.
evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
samphassaṁ sādiyantī antamaso uppalapattenapi muttakaraṇe pahāraṁ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ▁ samphass aṃ ▁sādiy antī ▁antamaso ▁ uppal apatt ena pi ▁mutt akaraṇ e ▁pa hār aṃ ▁deti ▁āpatti ▁pācittiy assa
